column5: I could use some help guys. I am going to the Ear Falls end of Lac Seul next week for the opener. I have fished Lac Seul many times but it has always been in June or July - not the opener. Any suggestions on what to do different now vs. summer would be appreciated. What types of locations should I look at first? Any tips will be helpful.
Typically shallow! Don't waste your time in front of the Sanctuary opening. Get into Sawmill Bay, we catch all our Eyes on jigs with minnows or leeches and just kill it on Slip Bobbers.
were are you staying at? will be up there at same time ,lots of places close to catch tons of eyes.
Gravelrash30 - We will be at Lac Seul Lodge in Ratt Bay.

Good luck on your trips! Save a few for those of us who have to wait until June! Be sure and give us a full report on where, how deep, what colors and the water temps! Just over three weeks to go for our group!
